summary: This appears to be a header or cover page for a document related to Jeffrey Epstein, referencing a news article about his life in prison and containing letterhead from a Senior Officer Specialist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and includes a Latin phrase meaning 'If you want peace, prepare for war.'

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the context of a news article about his life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, NY, NY 10007
keyFacts: Document references a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars.
Document header includes letterhead from a Senior Officer Specialist at the U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and includes the Latin phrase 'Si vis pacem, para bellum' (If you want peace, prepare for war).
Document is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case files with identifier SDNY_00011442.
